title: tsconfig.json with TSTL
description: JSON schema for the TypeScript compiler's configuration file with TSTL

buildMode.description: Use buildMode: "library" to build publishable library packages.

luaBundle.description: The name of the lua file to bundle output lua to. Requires luaBundleEntry.

luaBundleEntry.description: The entry *.ts file that will be executed when entering the luaBundle. Requires luaBundle.

luaLibImport.description: Specifies how js standard features missing in lua are imported.

luaTarget.description: Specifies the Lua version you want to generate code for.

noImplicitSelf.description:
If true, treats all project files as if they were prefixed with
/** @noSelfInFile **/.

noHeader.description: Specify if a header will be added to compiled files.

sourceMapTraceback.description: Applies the source map to show source TS files and lines in error tracebacks.

name.description: Path to the JS file, that contains the plugin code
